OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

BalancerCreated(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when a new balancer is created

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerBalancerUpkeep(address,uint32,ui.details: Approves LINK to registrar and calls registerUpkeep. Optionally sets forwarder if registry is provided.

params.emittingContract: DIA PushOracleReceiver contract emitting the event
params.filterSelector: per Chainlink docs; 0 = no indexed filters
params.topic1: indexed topic if filtering by key; otherwise 0x

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userDriftBalancers.details: Lists of deployed drift and time balancers per user

refreshBalancerForwarder(address).notice: Refresh and set the forwarder on a balancer from a known upkeepId

registerBalancerUpkeep(address,uint32,ui.notice: Programmatically register a custom-logic upkeep for a deployed balancer

registerLogTriggerUpkeep(address,uint32,.notice: Register a log-trigger upkeep for a DriftBalancerLogger (DIA push oracle logs)
